info.description: A REST API for user management built with Gin, MongoDB, and Redis.
info.title: Gin Sample API

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token and refresh token
Exchange a refresh token for a new access token
Create a new user account with email, password, and name

get.description: List all pending invitations for the authenticated user

post.description: Accept an invitation to join a team
Decline an invitation to join a team

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of teams the authenticated user belongs to

post.description: Create a new team. The authenticated user becomes the owner.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific team

put.description: Update team details. Requires owner or admin role.

delete.description: Soft delete a team and all its data. Requires owner role.

get.description: List all pending invitations for a team. Requires owner or admin role.

post.description: Invite a user to join a team. Requires owner or admin role.

delete.description: Cancel a pending invitation. Requires owner or admin role.

post.description: Leave a team. Owner cannot leave without transferring ownership.

get.description: Retrieve all members of a team with their details

delete.description: Remove a member from the team. Requires owner or admin role.

put.description: Update a member's role in the team. Requires owner or admin role.

post.description: Transfer team ownership to another member. Requires owner role.

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of a team's voice memos, sorted by newest first
Retrieve a specific voice memo from a team

delete.description: Soft delete a voice memo from a team

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users
Retrieve a single user by their ID

put.description: Update a user's email and/or name

delete.description: Remove a user from the system

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of the authenticated user's voice memos, sorted by newest first

delete.description: Mark a voice memo as deleted. User can only delete their own memos.

audioFileUrl.description: Pre-signed URL, not stored in DB

teamId.description: nil = private memo, set = team memo
